articles.title: These 37 Products May Be On The Newer End, But Reviewers Are Already Obsessed
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: TheraBreath launched Deep Clean Toothpaste, a new product from the oral rinse brand known for banishing bad breath. CeraVe has introduced the Balancing Air Foam Face Wash, which is designed for oil control and hydrating the skin.

articles.title: 41 Wickedly Good Beauty Products You'll Swear Are Magic
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: R.E.M. Beauty launched the Wicked Glinda Makeup Set. Essence introduced Lash Princess Mascara. Sol De Janeiro has a new firming cream with notes of pistachio, salted caramel, and vanilla. Laneige released Neo Blurring Powder. Catrice introduced the "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Biodance launched Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask. Clinique has a Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey.

articles.title: Android on tablets is eyeing an upgrade that could finally ease app multi-tasking
articles.author: Manisha Priyadarshini
articles.summary: Google is developing a multitasking upgrade for Android tablets. This upgrade will enable users to launch any app in a floating bubble, expanding beyond just chat or messaging apps. The new feature is indicated in leaked code within the Android 2510 Canary build.

articles.title: 29 Must-Have Cleaning Products For Parents
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Various companies are offering new or specialized cleaning products and solutions designed to address common household messes, particularly those caused by children and pets.  These range from stain removers like Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray and Grandma's Secret spot remover to appliance cleaners like the Angry Mama microwave cleaner and the Bissell multipurpose portable cleaner. Robotic vacuums are also highlighted as a solution for handling everyday messes.

articles.title: HONOR Breaks Guinness World Records™ title with the Unbreakable AI Smartphone, HONOR X9d
articles.author: arabtimes
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR X9d smartphone, emphasizing its durability and setting a Guinness World Record for the highest smartphone drop at 6.133 meters. Available in four colors, pre-orders for the 12GB+256GB model begin in Kuwait from October 23rd to 29th for KD 109.

articles.title: No ads: Egged presents an alternative to the Moovit app
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Egged Group is launching 'egg', a new public transportation app. The app promises an ad-free user experience.

articles.title: 49 Boring Products That Will Actually Excite You
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article showcases a diverse range of newly introduced products designed to improve everyday life. Among the highlighted items are: SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes, Medicube's Zero Pore Pads, Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Windex outdoor glass cleaner, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo, Nivea lightweight gel cream, Rael "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches, The Pink Stuff, TBH too nice Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, citrusy Liquid I.V. Hydration packets, Java Sock, longline sports bra, Venus Visage teeth whitening pens, Elizavecca's Collagen Coating Hair Protein Treatment and Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Stain Treater spray.

articles.title: **Android Calling Cards to Gain Full Customization Options**
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google is rolling out a new feature called "Android Calling Cards" that allows users to customize their incoming call experience on Android devices. This new feature allows users to define call reasons, screen calls, customize notifications, set up call forwarding rules, and enhance caller identification. Android Calling Cards enable users to filter unwanted calls, manage different call types efficiently, and personalize their calling experience.

articles.title: PHP Web Hosting Order Script with Domain Availability WHOIS RDAP Checking and Template
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart introduces a domain name and web hosting ordering PHP script. The script features domain availability and WHOIS RDAP checker, domain register and domain transfer and buying hosting option. It also includes IDN convertor (Internationalized Domain Name) and AI domain suggestion with registrar API.

articles.title: Chrome New Tab Page adds AI Mode, Incognito shortcuts: Here's what it means for users
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Google is updating Chrome for Android by enhancing the New Tab Page. The update introduces pill-shaped shortcuts for AI Mode and Incognito browsing, improving feature accessibility.

articles.title: Chrome New Tab Page adds AI Mode, Incognito shortcuts: Here's what it means for users
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is updating Chrome for Android and iOS with pill-shaped shortcuts for AI Mode and Incognito browsing on the New Tab Page. This update, available for users running version 141+ of Chrome, provides easier access to these features and streamlines the user experience.

articles.title: Chrome New Tab Page adds AI Mode, Incognito shortcuts: Here's what it means for users
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is updating Chrome for Android and iOS, version 141+, with a new New Tab Page (NTP) design. This includes pill-shaped shortcuts for AI Mode and Incognito browsing, placed directly under the search bar, providing faster access to these features. The update streamlines AI access on mobile, complementing the AI Mode functionality already integrated into the Omnibar.

articles.title: Is $50 dry shampoo really worth it?
articles.author: Rachel Sharp
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new dry shampoo products with advanced formulas and higher prices. K18 launched AirWash Dry Shampoo, while Klorane updated its Oil Control Dry Shampoo with 99% natural-origin ingredients. TypeBae released G5 3-in-1 Dry Shampoo with Baicapil.

articles.title: Shoppers rave about gadget to dry clothes in the winter without laundry taking over your house & it's currently £20 off
articles.author: Leanne Hall
articles.summary: Robert Dyas offers the JML Dri Buddi, a heated airer designed for drying clothes indoors. It can hold up to 10kg of damp clothes and uses a cocoon cover to trap heat for efficient drying, offered at a discounted price of £59.99.

articles.title: 4 essential Windows 11 apps that aren't built in but should be
articles.author: Chris Hachey
articles.summary: Start11 allows users to customize the Windows Start menu and taskbar. PDFgear is a free PDF editor for Windows with ChatGPT integration. Microsoft PowerToys offers customization tools for Windows, including PowerRename and FancyZones. Ditto Clipboard expands Windows clipboard functionality with unlimited storage and custom keyboard shortcuts.

articles.title: Reclaiming confidence in the AI age
articles.author: Janette Toral
articles.summary: The 'Smarter with AI Empowerment Tour' has been launched to educate individuals on practical AI applications, featuring live demonstrations of AI tools for tasks like email campaigns, social media posts, and 3D product design. The tour aims to demystify AI and empower MSMEs and freelancers by showing them how to confidently use AI in their work and daily lives.

articles.title: 4 things you can plug into your Android phone's USB port (that aren't chargers)
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Plugable introduced the USB-C to HDMI Adapter that lets laptops and desktops connect multiple 4K monitors at 60Hz over a single USB-C port. Samsung's Android phones offer DeX, which projects a Windows-style desktop interface when connected to a monitor or TV. Google integrated Desktop Mode into Android 16, featuring a tablet-style interface with support for multiple app windows and a taskbar.

articles.title: 34 TikTok-Approved Items
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. Stanley introduced a magnetic cup holder. Nyx launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum which functions as a lip stain. Fisher-Price released a DJ table for toddlers. Philips has introduced "Warm Glow Effect" soft white lightbulbs. Oxo has launched a compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer. Medicube launched a Turmeric Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Mask. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream. Skala launched Mais Cacho Hair Conditioning Treatment.

articles.title: Asad's Hot Chicken Announces 'THE MAC DROP' — A New Mac & Cheese Menu Launch
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Asad's Hot Chicken is launching a new Mac & Cheese menu called 'THE MAC DROP' on October 31st at its Bensalem and Norristown stores. The menu features three items: the Mac Attack ($11.99), the Loaded Mac ($11.99), and the Golden Cup ($4.99), all designed to complement the restaurant's famous hot chicken.

articles.title: This Nespresso Advent Calendar Is the Ultimate Gift for Coffee Lovers
articles.author: Fred Hernandez
articles.summary: Nespresso is launching its 2025 Advent Calendars, available in Vertuo ($55) and Original ($50) versions, each containing 24 unique coffee capsules. Both versions culminate in a limited-edition mug designed by Thandiwe Muriu, offering a variety of coffee blends and a festive experience for coffee lovers.

articles.title: Oukitel WP60 Marks a New Era in Smartphone Innovation With the World's First 7.2-Inch Giant-Screen and Striking Mecha Aesthetics
articles.author: Oukitel
articles.summary: Oukitel launched the WP60 rugged smartphone on October 25th, featuring a 7.2-inch display, 16GB RAM, 512GB storage, and a 10,000mAh battery. The WP60 will be available for a special launch price of $279.99.

articles.title: This Classic Holiday Treat Has Been Defiled With a Nasty New Flavor. But the Reason Why Is Even Grosser.
articles.author: Tim Brinkhof
articles.summary: Albert Heijn has launched a new product: extreme sour candy flavored pepernoten. This product is analyzed as a case study of corporate exploitation of social media trends, since these pepernoten were designed for viral content rather than consumption. However, there is anecdotal evidence that a niche customer base enjoys the product.

articles.title: Un pendentif retrouvé grâce à un détecteur de métal pourrait réécrire l'histoire d'amour entre Henri VIII et Catherine d'Aragon
articles.author: Giorgia Olivieri
articles.summary: An apparel company aims to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes. They collaborate with an agency to create profiles of potentially wealthy young parents. These profiles will then be used to target advertising within partner apps, showcasing the new baby clothing line.

articles.title: 37 Products With Before-And-Afters That'll Make You Say 'No Way' To Your Screen
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Nivea launched a lightweight gel cream with Q10 for skin firming and moisturizing. L'Oréal Paris introduced a BB Cream as an affordable alternative to Dr Jart+ Cicapair, designed to neutralize redness and even skin tone. Additionally, Catrice launched an "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, formulated to color-correct dark circles and brighten the under-eye area.

articles.title: 7 Best New Yankee Candle Christmas Finds Hitting Shelves This Week — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Groth
articles.summary: Yankee Candle has introduced several new Christmas-themed products, including the 'The Polar Express' and 'First Gift of Christmas' scents, alongside the return of annual bestsellers like 'Home for the Holidays' and 'White Christmas'. They have also released a 'Countdown to Christmas' Advent calendar featuring 24 mini candles in 12 different scents.

articles.title: Nerve Fresh — [TOP 5 BENEFITS 2025!] With PRICE?
articles.summary: Nerve Fresh, a new natural supplement, aims to support nerve health and alleviate nerve pain with ingredients like Prickly Pear, Passionflower, and Corydalis. It is available in one, three, and six-bottle packages, discounted at $69, $59, and $39 per bottle, respectively, with free worldwide shipping and a recommendation for 60-90 days of regular use for optimal results.

articles.title: Nerve Fresh – [Is It Scam or Legit?] Should You Buy?
articles.summary: Nerve Fresh has launched Nerve Fresh, a natural supplement, designed to sustain nerve wellness and ease nerve-related pain. The supplement's formula incorporates ingredients like Prickly Pear, Passionflower, and Corydalis to reduce inflammation, promote nerve regeneration, and enhance circulation. Nerve Fresh offers various packages, with the six-bottle option priced at $39 per bottle, and recommends taking 2 capsules daily for optimal results.

articles.title: Nerve Fresh [I've Tested] TRUTH EXPOSED!
articles.summary: Nerve Fresh is introduced as a natural supplement designed to support nerve health, reduce pain, and promote nerve regeneration. It contains ingredients like Prickly Pear, Passionflower, and Marshmallow Root. The product is available in different packages, with the six-bottle option offering the best value at $39 per bottle.

articles.title: So, the Little Caesar's model?
articles.author: Copy Link
articles.summary: A top KFC franchisee has debuted a new prototype restaurant. The design is optimized for drive-thru, carryout, and digital orders, featuring limited seating.

articles.title: Acme Fresh Market shoppers in North Canton get 1st look at renovated store
articles.author: The Alliance Review
articles.summary: Acme Fresh Market in North Canton has completed its renovation, offering customers new services including easy meals and a variety of specials. The renovated store features a smaller footprint and wider aisles.

articles.title: 27 Uncomplicated Products That Just Work
articles.author: Mariel Guzman
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff launched the "Sqeezy" sponge set, enhancing their all-purpose cleaner's effectiveness. Fur-Zoff introduced a pet hair remover made from recycled glass. Grip Clean released a heavy-duty hand soap with bentonite clay and pumice. Green Gobbler offers septic tank packets for preventing backups. Bottle Bright provides tablets for cleaning water bottles. Clorox introduced a toilet scrubbing wand with pre-loaded cleaner.

articles.title: I got a manicure in 20 minutes using a new AI device
articles.summary: Umia has launched an 'AI manicure device' that automates the painting component of a manicure in 100 seconds per nail. The device scans the nail, applies three coats of polish, and cures them using a convolutional neural network-based deep learning model. Umia envisions its machines in locations like hair salons and airports, offering a faster and cheaper alternative to traditional manicures.

articles.title: Google Pixel: AI functions are supposed to put a massive strain on the battery
articles.summary: Google's 'Android AI Core,' powering AI features in Pixel phones, impacts battery performance, leading to debates about balancing smart features and longevity. The company is also working on the Pixel 10 series, with some details leaked. Samsung is testing the Android 16 and its' new features

articles.title: 37 Beauty Items Reviewers Call The Best
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article highlights several beauty and skincare products, including NYX's waterproof eyeliner, CND SolarOil for nail care, Mielle's Rosemary Mint strengthening oil, and L'Oreal True Match Lumi Glotion for an illuminating glow. Juno & Co. offers Clean 10 cleansing balm, while Peach & Lily provides Glass Skin Refining Serum. Other featured products include Kiss 2-in-1 eyeliner, E.l.f. Poreless Putty primer, SoCozy curl conditioning spray, Schick Silk Touch-Up Multipurpose Tool, Frank Body's coffee scrub, Revlon drying brush and oil-absorbing roller, Essence's Lash Princess mascara, Cosrx's snail mucin repairing essence, Elizabeth Mott's Thank Me Later eyeshadow primer, CeraVe Retinol Serum, Laneige's lip sleeping mask, and O'Keeffe's Lip Repair.

articles.title: Business News  Behind the Rise of Novel Tissues: The Visionary Who Redefined India's Hygiene Standard
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Novel Tissues, in collaboration with DRDO, launched REMOCON, a radiological decontamination skin wipe. This product is designed to protect individuals from radioactive contamination during emergencies. This showcases the company's dedication to blending hygiene with life-saving innovation.

articles.title: Alibaba renews consumer push with new AI chatbot, smart glasses
articles.author: Anabelle Colaco
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched a new AI chatbot service within its Quark app, powered by the latest Qwen3 models, offering text or voice conversations and real-time information access.  Additionally, pre-sales for Alibaba's Quark AI Glasses, priced at 4,699 yuan, began on October 24, with shipping scheduled for December.

articles.title: South African stars align for the launch of HONOR's stylish and smart HONOR X7d 5G
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR X7d 5G, a new device featuring 5-star Drop Protection, IP65 Water Resistance, a 6500mAh battery, and AI-powered MagicOS 9.0, at an event in Johannesburg. Available in Desert Gold and Velvet Black from November 1st, it's priced at R3 999 and includes benefits such as HONOR Care 3-month Screen Protection and free shipping to the HONOR repair centre.

articles.title: Amazon's 4K projector quietly drops from £240 to £90 – shoppers say it ‘feels like a mini cinema'
articles.author: Tom Tyers
articles.summary: The Wielio 4K Smart Projector is available on Amazon for a discounted price of £89.98 with a voucher. The projector, powered by Android 11, features preloaded apps like Netflix and Prime Video, supports 1080p and 4K resolution, and includes WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2.

articles.title: Omoda 9 SHS: Making a name for itself
articles.author: Sean O'Grady
articles.summary: Chery's Omoda brand has launched the Omoda 9 SHS, a plug-in hybrid SUV featuring a claimed electric-only range of 93 miles and a total range of 700 miles. The vehicle includes advanced features like laser-based Lidar assistance, a 24.6-inch display, and heated/ventilated seats, targeting the competitive plug-in hybrid SUV market.

articles.title: Aldi launches subscription free video doorbell to rival Ring, Blink and Nest and it's just £16.99
articles.author: Ben Hurst
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a video doorbell priced at £16.99, offering a subscription-free alternative to Ring, Blink, and Nest. The doorbell features battery power, micro SD card support, two-way talking, water resistance, motion detection, and night vision, providing a basic smart home security solution.

articles.title: Top 5 Long-Lasting Body Mists for Women – Refreshing & Fragrant Picks
articles.summary: IDPL promotes several fragrance mists, including warm vanilla, cozy vanilla, fruity grape floral, elegant floral, and twin fruity floral scents. These mists offer hydrating freshness and long-lasting fragrances for hair and body.

articles.title: Top 5 Lipsticks Every Woman Needs for Perfect Lips
articles.summary: Several new lipstick products are available for purchase. These include hydrating bullet lipsticks with a smooth matte mauve finish, lightweight creamy lipsticks with intense color, peptide-enriched lipsticks offering a velvety matte finish, rich satin lipsticks with long-lasting color, and soft matte lipsticks infused with natural oils for hydration and an elegant nude finish. These new product are now available to Order.

articles.title: Aldi launches subscription free video doorbell that rivals Nest and its just 16.99
articles.author: Ben Hurst
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a budget-friendly video doorbell priced at £16.99, offering an alternative to Ring, Blink, and Nest. The doorbell features two-way communication, water resistance, motion detection, and night vision, using micro SD cards for storage, and does not require a subscription. It offers a basic model for users, and the doorbell's features are listed on Aldi's product listing.

articles.title: Shoppers love gadget that 'dries my washing very quickly'
articles.summary: The JML DriBuddi, an electric clothes dryer, is available on Amazon for £79.99. It boasts an 850W element, dries loads up to 10kg, and reduces ironing time. Dunelm and Lakeland also offer alternative clothes drying gadgets, including a three-tier heated airer and a heated drying pod airer, respectively.

articles.title: Evertune: Interview With Co-Founder & CEO Brian Stempeck About The Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) And AI Marketing Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Evertune launched a comprehensive Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) and AI marketing platform designed to improve brand visibility in AI search. The platform includes AI Brand Monitoring, AI Website Optimization, and an AI Content Studio. Evertune's future goal is to create a marketing suite to enable brands to thrive in the AI economy and capture AI commerce.

articles.title: JumpCloud: Interview With Director Of Product Marketing Chase Doelling About The Open Directory Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: JumpCloud offers a unified platform for IT, featuring multi-factor authentication (MFA), single sign-on (SSO), mobile device management (MDM), conditional access, and SaaS management. They recently expanded into Privileged Access Management (PAM) with the acquisition of VaultOne and Resmo and rolled out conditional access and passwordless access. JumpCloud is also focused on building AI and automation capabilities and expanding device trust features.

articles.title: I let Edge's Copilot Mode buy me a new space heater - here's how the ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Microsoft Edge has integrated AI to function as a shopping assistant. The updated browser has morphed into an AI-powered service enhancing its shopping capabilities for users.

articles.title: OPPO introduces A6 Pro in Lagos
articles.author: Amos
articles.summary: OPPO has launched the OPPO A6 Pro smartphone in Nigeria. It features a 7,000mAh battery, IP69 water and dust protection, AGC DT-Star D+ Crystal Shield Glass, 120Hz AMOLED display, ColorOS 15, and Trinity Engine.

articles.title: Aldi's Nifty Pantry Organizer Is Such a Game-Changer
articles.author: Molly Burford
articles.summary: Aldi is launching Crofton Hanging Pantry Containers for $8.99 as part of their Crofton kitchen line. The set includes three one-liter containers with a hanger to save pantry space. Aldi also offers a two-pack of 1.5-liter containers for $8.99.

articles.title: Amazon's new Help Me Decide button picks what you were going to buy anyway – ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Amazon introduced 'Help Me Decide', a new AI-powered feature. This feature suggests products based on individual user habits.

articles.title: China's BYD battles rivals with new hybrid EV that promises 1,335 miles range
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: BYD launched the 2026 Qin L DM-i, a new plug-in hybrid sedan positioned above the Qin Plus. The 2026 Qin L DM-i features upgrades in efficiency and comfort and provides an electric-only range of about 80 miles.

articles.title: New player Voltai introduces two-wheel EV and battery swap ecosystem for fleets
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Startup venture Voltai introduced its inaugural product.
